page.title: 18COMMUNICATION
page.content: Most people in the area have televions sets or radios. The telephone service is most reliable and most homes have telephones. Newspapers play an important part in communication, they are delivered daily but not everyone has them. 102 papers are delivered each day. The power supply is not very reliable particularly in winter. There are 110 telephone lines in the Hougham and Marston area. In an outlying area such as this telephone communication is very important. A local farmer has a C.B. as do one or two local residents.
